label: 逢坂
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Name of an old checkpoint, or barrier (seki), on the Eastern Sea Road leading from the capital to Kamakura; situated on the border between Yamashiro and Ōmi provinces, in the mountains between the capital and Lake Biwa. Utamakura; subject of many poems about meeting and parting. [関　鎌倉　山城　近江　琵琶湖]
